lyrics.text:
Ko e Laumālie,
‘O hotau ‘Otua,
Ko e monū’ia’anga,
Ki he angahala.

’Oku ‘a’ahi mai,
’A ‘ene ‘Afio;
Ki he kakai angakovi,
Pea takitala’i.

Pea fakaongo,
Ki he lotonoa;
Pea fakapoto leva,
‘A e loto vale.

’Oku ne langa’i
‘I he loto kovi,
‘A e feinga mamahi,
Mo e manavahē.

Pea ‘oku taki,
‘E he Laumālie,
‘A e kakai ‘oku holi;
Ki he vai mo’ui.

’A ia ko Sīsū,
‘Oku anga’ofa,
Ki he kau feinga mamahi,
Mo e mafasia.
